item.title: Integrate a MS Copilot Chatbot with MkDocs
item.description: In this post I’d like to show you how to integrate a custom Microsoft Copilot Studio Chatbot with MkDocs. The goal is to provide a chatbot on all pages of the documentation, that is trained with the content of the documentation, see screenshot. About this Approach You can connect to a copilot with a custom canvas that is hosted as a standalone web app in your MkDocs project. This option is best if you need to embed a customized iFrame across multiple web pages / documentation pages.
